mapper.select: SELECT ann.total_title as totaltitle, subann.sub_title as subtitle, ann.ann_type as anntype, ann.started_at as startedat, ann.closed_at as closedat, ann.status as status FROM announcement ann inner join sub_announcement subann on ann.ann_no = subann.ann_no inner join rnd_plan rnd on rnd.sub_ann_no = subann.sub_ann_no WHERE rnd.mem_no = #{memNo}

SELECT ann.total_title as totaltitle, subann.sub_title as subtitle, ann.ann_type as anntype, ann.started_at as startedat, ann.closed_at as closedat, rnd.submitted_at as submittedat, rnd.plan_status as planstatus FROM announcement ann inner join sub_announcement subann on ann.ann_no = subann.ann_no inner join rnd_plan rnd on rnd.sub_ann_no = subann.sub_ann_no WHERE rnd.mem_no = #{memNo}
